data.message: The homophobes on here are disgusting, vile people.    Love to all the Facebook gays!   We're the winners!  There's love in our hearts and love conquers all!

replies.message: You can win all the battles and still lose the war.
It's done Rob.  You lost.  Get over it.
Rob, I challenge you to give one example of a war in which battles occurrred, all were won by one side, yet the other side was the victor.

I don't understand how you LGB supporters say you're so full of love for everyone around you, but go around insulting, pointing fingers, and calling names just as much as anyone else. Maybe you should take your own advice, and stop being disgusting yourselves.
